Representative Reviews.Review: Giving 3 stars, because sometimes the app doesnt support UPI payments and says to update to the latest version or to reopen the app, even though the app is at the latest version. Even after reopening the app the same message is displayed and I cant make any UPI payments. Please resolve this issue by providing a new version for this app.

Hey, today this app shows this devicemy device is rooted or compromised. App will not work on compromised device due to security reasons. I used the INDmoney app to complete a mobile recharge, but the recharge was not processed. It has been over 48 hours, and the status is still showing as pending. However, the amount has already been deducted from my account. I tried waiting, but nothing has been updated. This is very disappointing and inconvenient. Please resolve this issue as soon as possible and improve the recharge service worst app dont use this app my sincere request
Best app for Indian stocks, mutual funds and foreign stocks. All in one app.

Indmoney provide lot of advanced features that your investment or trading journey more easy. This app interface very attractive . This app very fast . IND Money is a all in online solution for stock market. . 20.08.25 IND Money new update for Indian Stocks very impressive . 20.11.25 New update regarding watchlist is good.
nice application because its option for all in one and investment in FD, Insurance and Indian stocks market as well as US stock market . Its good for ipos.

I simply like this app. It is well configured to track your investments. Also allows to track your assets and liabilities, goals, helps to invest in mutual funds, shares, FDs, Insurance through multiple ways. It is improving day by day to add more features to have one window solutions to track your portfolio in real sense. I would suggest improvement in recurring or fixed entries for other, private or cash investments.

Please Fix these issues otherwise great app. 1. when I open a stocks chart it initially show the previous stocks chart I had opened instead of the current stock. Perhaps a delay in the api call is happening tell the tech team to solve it. 2. When a see an option of buying or selling below a stock chart , when I change the option from delivery to intraday it should also show stoploss option there itself,I need to go back to the positions options and add SL which is quite inconvenient.

Pros 1. Best user interface for options trading. 2. Us stocks buying feature. 3. Mind feature king of the features. Cons 1. Trading views chart missing in flash mode. 2. Option chain windows takes lot of space in web mode. Solution could be auto hide or manual hide feature in web mode 3. Advanced option chain option should be provided such as dhan, upstox. For other greeks 4. Paper trading feature or bactesting feature missing. 5. App crash so frequent.

I have been using this app for a while time the app is so good comparing with other... And FO is also entry and exit with real time price.. What A app and what a apps team technical and customer Really want to say just within a week my problem was resolved against the UPI thankyou team for taking my difficult as serious and give me the best response as soon as you can with resolving it... Wonderful App with the Wonderful team support
